example.text: If extreme MAGA Republicans force a default, you’ll pay the price. Democrats are committed to lowering costs for everyday Americans and are ready to get to work and prevent economic disaster. [[url]]

We need to continue this work, and I look forward to working with Chairman McCaul and the gentleman from Florida on these efforts. Congress must repeal outdated war authorizations once and for all, and I applaud the Senate Foreign Relations Committee for their bipartisan vote to repeal the 2002 and the 1991 AUMFs earlier today.

The Bipartisan Infrastructure Law will transform our transportation system this #InfrastructureDecade with greener and cleaner roads, bridges, rail, transit, ports, airports, EV infrastructure and more. In New York, more than $5.4B has been allocated for these major projects.
Democrats are ready to work with Republicans to pay our bills and prevent a default on our debt. But we will not allow our communities to be held hostage by extreme MAGA Republicans.
If extreme MAGA Republicans force a default, you’ll pay the price. Democrats are committed to lowering costs for everyday Americans and are ready to get to work and prevent economic disaster. [[url]]
I believe that the importance of combating ISIS in Syria should be on such an authorization, and this is part of why I oppose H Con. Res. 21.

"Speaker McCarthy and House Republicans authored and passed a bill that keeps Trump-era immigration policies in place and does nothing but punish those who are fleeing extreme violence and persecution..." [[url]]
